TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 562-563
TEI.2.document_title: G B Cotten to Stephen F Austin, 12-18-1830

barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin in account with G. B. cotten, December 18, 1830. For printing.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 562-563

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin in account with G. B. Cotten, December 18, 1830. For printing. */p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1829">1829 */date_mentioned*Dr. *person_mentioned*Col Stephen F Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="11-20-1829">Nov. 20*/date_mentioned* To printing 50 certificates and 25 Notices---------- 14.00*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="11-30-1830">30*/date_mentioned*. To printing Notes------------------- 5.00*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="12-01-1829">Decr. 1*/date_mentioned*, To printing extra Notices *date_mentioned n="11-20-1829">20th Nov-*/date_mentioned*-------- 4.00*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="11-27-1829">27*/date_mentioned*. To printing 100 Certificates, do Notes-------------20.00*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="11-27-1829">" */date_mentioned* To printing Land titles for *person_mentioned*Padilla*/person_mentioned*-------- 20.00*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1830">1830*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="01-15-1830">Jany. 15*/date_mentioned* To 9 *location_mentioned*Pamphlets*/location_mentioned*-------------- 13.50*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="01-15-1830">" */date_mentioned* To printing 100 Certificates $6 and 25 Petns---------------16.00*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="01-23-1830">23*/date_mentioned*. To adv. Certificates 3 sqr. 21 t---------------- 22.00*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="01-23-1830">"*/date_mentioned* To printing 12 quires blanks @ 2.50-----------30.00*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="01-23-1830">"*/date_mentioned* To 175 Copies of *location_mentioned*Pamphlet */location_mentioned*@ 1.50------------------262.50*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="03-22-1830">March 22*/date_mentioned* To printing 100 Notes------------ 5.00*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="04-14-1830">Apl. 14 */date_mentioned*To printing 100 Certificates—------8.00*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="05-18-1830">May 18*/date_mentioned*. To printing 2 quires of blanks---------- 8.00*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="05-22-1830">22 */date_mentioned*To adv. order *person_mentioned*Austin Battallion*/person_mentioned*---4.00*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="05-28-1830">28*/date_mentioned*. To printing Notes---------- 5.00*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="06-01-1830">June 1.*/date_mentioned* To printing blank deeds----------- 15.00*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="06-21-1830">21*/date_mentioned*. To 150 Certificates------------ 9.00*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="06-29-1830">29*/date_mentioned*. To 110 do------------7.00*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="07-22-1830">July 22. */date_mentioned*To 9 *location_mentioned*Pamphletes */location_mentioned*from *person_mentioned*De Witt*/person_mentioned*------------ 13. 50*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="08-14-1830">Augt 14*/date_mentioned*. To 5 Subscriptions to *location_mentioned*Texas Gazette*/location_mentioned*------------30.00*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="11-21-1830">Nov. 21. */date_mentioned*To printing deeds 2 sides------------ 20.00*/p*
*p*To 50 Copies of Laws @ 75 Cts--------------37.50*/p*
*p*To printing 1000 Electoral tickets and 200 *location_mentioned*Circulars*/location_mentioned*-----------25.00*/p*
*p*594.00*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1829">1829*/date_mentioned* Contra Cr*/p* *p**date_mentioned n="11-20-1830">Nov. 20. */date_mentioned*By Cash for paper------------ 15.00*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="08-14-1830">1830, Augt 14*/date_mentioned* By 6 *location_mentioned*pamphlets*/location_mentioned*-----------9.00*/p*
*p*By *person_mentioned*Whiteside*/person_mentioned*s order--------------- 127.50*/p*
*person_mentioned*By Cash from *person_mentioned*S. M. Williams*/person_mentioned*---------------20.00*/person_mentioned*
*p*By do. by *person_mentioned*Mr Converse*/person_mentioned*-------------6.00*/p*
*p*By do---------do------------ 9.00*/p*
*p*By order on *p*Cotten*/p*------------- 10.00*/p*
*p*By 21 *location_mentioned*Pamphlets*/location_mentioned*------------ 31.50*/p*
*p*By *person_mentioned*Petit*/person_mentioned*-------------47.50*/p*
*p*$275.00*/p*
*p*By *person_mentioned*Small*/person_mentioned*s note-----------61.00*/p*
*p*By *person_mentioned*Ira Ingram*/person_mentioned*--------35.00*/p*
*p*96.00*/p*
*p*371.00*/p*
*p*Amt. of Debit-----------594.00*/p*
*p*Do of Cr------------- 275.00*/p*
*p*Due *person_mentioned*G. B. Cotten*/person_mentioned*---------$319.00*/p*
*p*To amt. of Debit of the within a/c--------------594.*/p*
*p*To 1400 feet plank @ 666-------------93.24*/p*
*p*687.24*/p*
*p*By credits from other side-------------371.00*/p*
*p*316.24*/p* *p*Recd. payment in full by draft on *person_mentioned*John Austin*/person_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="12-18-1830">Decr. 18, 1830*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*G B Cotten*/person_mentioned**/p*
